person.persName: Aaron Turpin (Wayne County, Kentucky, student, farm laborer, shoemaker, and soldier)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, student, farm laborer, shoemaker, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Turpin and Milly Turpin. Married Mary F. Smith Turpin in Wayne County, Kentucky, on February 8, 1855. Father of Susan Catherine Turpin and Alfred A. Turpin. Married Elisabeth Dawse Turpin in Pulaski County on March 27, 1861. Father of Polly J. L. Turpin and George W. W. Turpin. Student in Pulaski County in 1850. Farm laborer in Wayne County in 1860. Shoemaker in Wayne County in 1860. Served in the 30th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as a first sergeant from April 5, 1864, to April 18, 1865.
